content: fresno nightcrawler pattern set this pattern makes two pieces of different sizes and is beginner friendly the finished pieces come out to about 6 and 3 5 tall they are worked bottom-up in continuous rounds please respect and follow the publishing guidelines outlined in the pattern footnotes enjoy materials - 3 75mm crochet hook or similar - worsted weight acrylic yarn in white approx 150 yds - yarn needle - scissors - stitch markers - fiber fill - two sets of 6mm safety eyes or embroidery thread and needle as you prefer terminology - chain chain - sl slip_stitch - single_crochet single_crochet - mc magic_ring - fo finish off - decrease decrease stitch 2 single crochets together - increase increase in single_crochet stitch 2 single crochets in the next stitch - 3 increase three increase in single_crochet stitch 3 single crochets in the next stitch - round round by frances @ justtoomuchyarn pattern is for the personal use of the purchasing customer only this pattern or its components are not to be sold or reproduced by anyone outside of the creator or her influence under any circumstances finished products may be shared online or sold in limited number by the pattern purchaser with appropriate credit to justtoomuchyarn in the piece description and attached to finished product part 1 papa nightcrawler instructions for the papa nightcrawler are as follows make sure to mark the last stitch of each round as you will be working in reference to it as you work up the legs legs make 2 - round 1 mc 6 single_crochet - round 2 increase 6 times 12 single_crochet - rnds 3 to 13 12 single_crochet around - round 14 3 increase 11 single_crochet 14 single_crochet - round 15 1 single_crochet 3 increase 12 single_crochet 16 single_crochet fo for first leg only you will attach the legs and continue with the body by working off of the second leg you made stuff the legs with filling and continue as you work up the body body - round 16 3 sl chain 1 off second leg single_crochet in 3rd st of first leg to connect 6 single_crochet decrease 7 single_crochet single_crochet in loop of chain 7 single_crochet decrease 7 single_crochet single_crochet in other loop of chain 32 single_crochet - round 17 7 single_crochet decrease 14 single_crochet decrease 7 single_crochet 30 single_crochet - round 18 6 single_crochet decrease 13 single_crochet decrease 7 single_crochet 28 single_crochet - rnds 19 to 20 28 single_crochet around - round 21 5 single_crochet decrease 4 times 24 single_crochet - round 22 4 single_crochet decrease 4 times 20 single_crochet - rnds 23 to 25 20 single_crochet around - round 26 8 single_crochet decrease twice 18 single_crochet - rnds 27 to 29 18 single_crochet around place safety eyes between 26th and 27th rounds four spaces apart - round 30 1 single_crochet decrease 6 times 12 single_crochet - round 31 decrease 6 times 6 single_crochet fo and sew closed part 2 baby nightcrawler the baby nightcrawler is made using
